entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Grand Manan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:52 a.m. ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.0Â°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 46 %

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Low minus 1 except plus 2 over Grand Manan Island.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets beginning this evening then changing to freezing rain after midnight. Rain over Grand Manan Island late this evening and after midnight. Ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm except rainfall amount 20 mm over Grand Manan Island. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 1 except plus 2 over Grand Manan Island. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Freezing rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Rain over Grand Manan Island early in the morning. Fog patches developing in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023
